TextView.android:text: Note: Check power source switching over operation of PCU i.e. from Primary power source to Secondary power source. Make sure all corresponding Fuse / MCBS are working normal before performing below steps
a. Switch OFF MCB catering to Primary Supply of PCU‐1. Observe for relay change over sound
b. Switch ON MCB catering to Primary Supply of PCU‐1
Relay changes over and equipment operates normal (Nml)
Measure earth resistance for earth pits and record the values in Table 1 below
Check working of Electrical Standby Generator & It’s Taking Over time from Mains Supply
Generator working normal and take over time is < 6sec
Table 1 INMCC Equipment Earth Resistance Measurement
